title: Spotify
description: Spotify is the world’s most popular music streaming app that lets you listen to millions of songs, podcasts, and curated playlists anytime, anywhere. Discover new artists, follow your favorite creators, and enjoy personalized recommendations based on your taste. With offline downloads and high-quality audio, Spotify brings your music journey to life.

title: Canva
description: Canva is a powerful design platform that empowers everyone to create stunning visuals with ease. From social media graphics and marketing posters to videos, presentations, and resumes — design anything using drag-and-drop simplicity. Access thousands of free templates, stock photos, and fonts to bring your creative vision to life in minutes.

title: Snapseed
description: Snapseed is Google’s professional photo editing app designed for photographers and creators. It offers a complete range of precision editing tools, filters, and effects to enhance your photos like a pro. With advanced features such as selective adjust, healing, and RAW photo support, Snapseed gives you full creative control over every image.

title: Notion
description: Notion is an all-in-one workspace that lets you plan, write, and organize your life in one place. Combine notes, tasks, databases, calendars, and wikis to manage both personal goals and team projects. Its minimalist interface and real-time collaboration make productivity simple, flexible, and enjoyable for individuals and professionals alike.

title: Duolingo
description: Duolingo is the world’s most popular app for learning languages through fun, bite-sized lessons. Improve your reading, writing, and speaking skills with gamified exercises that make learning enjoyable. Whether you're studying English, Spanish, or Japanese — Duolingo adapts to your progress and helps you stay motivated every day.

title: Trello
description: Trello is a visual collaboration tool that helps you organize work and life with boards, lists, and cards. Plan projects, assign tasks, and track progress all in one place. Perfect for teams or individuals, Trello makes project management simple, transparent, and flexible — keeping everyone aligned from start to finish.

title: Zoom
description: Zoom is a trusted platform for video conferencing, online meetings, and instant messaging. Whether you’re attending remote classes, hosting webinars, or collaborating with global teams — Zoom delivers seamless video and audio quality. With screen sharing, chat, and virtual backgrounds, it’s the all-in-one communication tool for modern work.

title: Adobe Lightroom
description: Adobe Lightroom is the essential photo editing and organization tool for creators and professionals. Easily enhance your images using advanced sliders, presets, and AI-powered adjustments. Sync your edits across devices and store your photos securely in the cloud — making Lightroom the perfect blend of creativity and efficiency.
